Package org.catlady.server.game

Class PlayerBoard

java.lang.Object
org.catlady.server.game.PlayerBoard
public class PlayerBoard extends Object
Defines the board of a player in a game. It contains the player hand, its cats, the FoodReserve and the amount of victory token.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PlayerBoard()
    Create a player board ready for the start of a game.
    PlayerBoard(List<Card> playerHand, List<CatCard> playerCats, FoodReserve foodReserve, int victoryPointToken)
    Build a player board from scratch.

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayerBoard

      public PlayerBoard(List<Card> playerHand, List<CatCard> playerCats, FoodReserve foodReserve, int victoryPointToken)
      Build a player board from scratch. Normally only used for deserialization.
      Parameters:
      playerHand - the Cards in player's hand
      playerCats - the player's cats
      foodReserve - the FoodReserve containing the player food resources
      victoryPointToken - the number of victory tokens.

    • PlayerBoard

      public PlayerBoard()
      Create a player board ready for the start of a game.

    • addVictoryPointToken

      public void addVictoryPointToken(int amount)
      Add a certain amount of victory token.
      Parameters:
      amount - the number of token to add

    • handleDrewCards

      public void handleDrewCards(List<Card> drewCards)
      Process the cards drew by the player in 3 main ways: FoodCard are deleted and their content added to FoodReserve; ToyCard, CatnipCard, CostumeCard, SprayBottleCard, LostCatCard are added to the player's hand, and CatCard are added to the player's cats.
      Parameters:
      drewCards - the Card to process
      Throws:
      UnknownCardException - when the card type is not recognized

    • canUseCards

      public boolean canUseCards(List<Card> cards)
      Check if a list of Cards can be played verifying if the player have them in its hand.
      Parameters:
      cards - the cards to verify
      Returns:
      true if the cards can be played, false otherwise

    • useCards

      public void useCards(List<Card> cards)
      Use the provided list of Cards removing them from the player hand.
      Parameters:
      cards - the cards used
      Throws:
      IllegalPlayException - if the cards are not all in player hand
